nodes.text: Zoochberry cream was a type of cream that contained zoochberries and was edible by Humans. In 5 ABY, zoochberry cream was served at a meeting of the Central Committee of Grand Moffs on the planet Kessel, alongside Whaladon meat. The Committee had declared the Human mutant Trioculus to be their new Emperor, and while receiving suggestions from the Moffs for a new Imperial base, Trioculus became enraged at the poor quality of their ideas and slammed his fist on the table, knocking a serving flask of zoochberry cream to the floor.
Zoochberry cream appeared in The Glove of Darth Vader, a 1992 novel by Paul and Hollace Davids.
